attributes.action: stop Harlequin Rugby Football Club playing home matches away from The Stoop
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Harlequin RFC have begun playing home matches away from The Stoop, and instead at The home of English Rugby, Twickenham.  We believe that this practice should be stopped forthwith, and that all matches meant to played at their home ground should be played at their home ground. This practice appears to fail the provision of any Sport England funding to HRFC and dilute the experience of Twickenham to the sporting fan.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
